original_text: When the soldiers had crucified Jesus, they took his garments and divided them into four parts, one part for each soldier; also his tunic. But the tunic was seamless, woven in one piece from top to bottom,
korean_text: 군인들이 예수를 십자가에 못 박고 그의 옷을 취하여 네 깃에 나눠 각각 한 깃씩 얻고 속옷도 취하니 이 속옷은 호지 아니하고 위에서부터 통으로 짠 것이라

sentences.original_text: When the soldiers had crucified Jesus,
sentences.korean_translation: 군인들이 예수님을 십자가에 못 박았을 때,

sentences.original_text: and divided them into four parts,
woven in one piece from top to bottom,
